body:
I have been on Avicus for a long time now. I used to play OCN, but got banned and moved to here. I played with a team (berzerk) my homies. They were my 'internet friends.' I basically got toxic and made the team disband (joke times.) I remember when I was in a scrimmage with bad company or something like that and I had a custom client on, I changed the knockback multiplier to max settings, then got hit on top of s skybridge and I went flying in the sky, that was also a good time. I got banned for it lol.

I remember fouled or whatever he is called got me unbanned even though he knew I was cheating. Good times lol.

title: My last thread.
